```{r}
library(seriation)
library(ComplexHeatmap)

cluster_df <- function(df, row_var, col_var, value_var, values_fill = 0) {
  # browser()
  mat <- df %>%
    select({{row_var}}, {{col_var}}, {{value_var}}) %>%
    pivot_wider(names_from = {{col_var}}, values_from = {{value_var}}, values_fill = values_fill) %>%
    column_to_rownames(rlang::as_name(rlang::enquo(row_var)))
  # browser()
  if (rlang::is_bare_numeric(pull(df, {{value_var}}))) {
    dist_rows <- dist(mat, method = "euclidian")
    dist_cols <- dist(t(mat), method = "euclidian")
  } else {
    # browser()
    dist_rows <- cluster::daisy(mat, metric = "gower")
    dist_cols <- t(mat) %>%
      as.data.frame() %>%
      mutate(across(everything(), \(x) factor(x, levels = levels(pull(df, {{value_var}}))))) %>%
      cluster::daisy(metric = "gower")
  }
  clust_rows <- hclust(dist_rows, method = "average") %>%
      reorder(dist_rows, method = "olo")
  clust_cols <- hclust(dist_cols, method = "average") %>%
      reorder(dist_cols, method = "olo")
  df %>%
    mutate(
      "{{row_var}}" := factor({{row_var}}, levels = clust_rows$labels[clust_rows$order]),
      "{{col_var}}" := factor({{col_var}}, levels = clust_cols$labels[clust_cols$order])
    )
}


cluster_fun_eucl <- function(mat, sample_in_col = TRUE) {
  # if (!sample_in_col) {

  # browser()
  dist_mat <- dist(mat)
  # dist_mat <- as.dist(mat)
  clust <- hclust(dist_mat, method = "average")

}
```

```{r}
hm_contrasts <- c(
  "PTX", "GNE-495", "JNK-inh",
  "GNE-495 + PTX", "JNK-inh + PTX"
)

hm_genes <- de %>%
  filter(
    FDR < 0.05
  ) %>%
  distinct(gene_id)
```

```{r}
hm_mat <- de %>%
  semi_join(hm_genes) %>%
  filter(contrast %in% hm_contrasts) %>%
  select(gene_id, contrast, logFC) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = contrast, values_from = logFC) %>%
  column_to_rownames("gene_id") %>%
  as.matrix() %>% {
    .[, hm_contrasts]
  }

hm_mat_scaled <- hm_mat %>%
  t() %>%
  scale(scale = TRUE, center = FALSE) %>%
  t()

row_meta <- rescue_type_list %>%
  filter(
    gene_id %in% rownames(hm_mat),
    rescue_definition == "significant_opposite"
  ) %>%
  select(
    gene_id,
    direction = perturbed,
    rescue_type
  ) %>%
  column_to_rownames("gene_id") %>%
  as.data.frame() %>% {
    .[rownames(hm_mat), ]
  }

row_clust <- cluster_fun_eucl(hm_mat_scaled, sample_in_col = TRUE)

mat_max_abs <- max(abs(quantile(hm_mat_scaled, c(.025, .975), na.rm = TRUE)))
hm <- Heatmap(
  hm_mat_scaled,
  col = circlize::colorRamp2(seq(from = -mat_max_abs, to = mat_max_abs, length.out = 51), paletteer::paletteer_c("pals::ocean.balance", n = 51)),
  show_column_names = TRUE,
  show_row_names = FALSE,
  cluster_rows = row_clust,
  cluster_columns = FALSE,
  use_raster = TRUE,
  raster_device = "agg_png",
  right_annotation = HeatmapAnnotation(
    df = row_meta,
    which = "row",
    col = list(
      direction = c("up" = "red", "down" = "blue", "not perturbed" = "white"),
      rescue_type = c(
        "both" = "purple", "no rescue" = "grey",
        "GNE-495 only" = "blue", "JNK-inh only" = "red",
        "not perturbed" = "white"
      )
    )
  ),
  show_row_dend = FALSE
)

withr::with_pdf(
  file.path("plots", "de_heatmaps", "all_de_genes.pdf"),
  draw(hm),
  width = 7, height = 15
)
```


## PCA


```{r}
rlog_mat <- counts_trans_ruvk4 %>%
  filter(
    transformation == "rlog"
  ) %>%
  select(-transformation) %>%
  column_to_rownames("gene_id") %>%
  as.matrix()


pca_raw <- prcomp(
  t(rlog_mat),
  center = TRUE,
  scale = FALSE
)

pca_eigen <- broom::tidy(
  pca_raw, matrix = "eigenvalues"
)

pca_eigen_map <- with(
  pca_eigen,
  set_names(
    signif(percent * 100, 2),
    paste0("PC", seq_along(PC))
  )
)

pca_x <- pca_raw$x %>%
  as_tibble(rownames = "sample_id") %>%
  left_join(
    de_meta,
    by = "sample_id"
  )

pca_x_long <- pca_x %>%
  select(sample_id, starts_with("PC")) %>%
  pivot_longer(
    starts_with("PC"),
    names_to = "PC",
    values_to = "value"
  )
```


```{r}
pca_x_vs <- combn(1:4, 2) %>%
  t() %>%
  magrittr::set_colnames(c("component_1", "component_2")) %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  mutate(
    across(
      everything(),
      \(x) paste0("PC", x)
    )
  ) %>%
  left_join(
    pca_x_long,
    by = c("component_1" = "PC")
  ) %>%
  left_join(
    pca_x_long,
    by = c("component_2" = "PC", "sample_id"),
    suffix = c("_1", "_2")
  ) %>%
  left_join(
    de_meta,
    by = "sample_id"
  )
```


```{r}

rd_bu_colors <- RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(5, "RdBu")
treatment_colors <- c(
  `JNK-inh` = rd_bu_colors[1],
  `GNE-495` = tail(rd_bu_colors, 1),
  `DMSO` = "gray70"
)

p <- ggplot(
  pca_x_vs,
  aes(
    x = value_1,
    y = value_2,
    shape = paclitaxel,
    color = treatment
  )
) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_color_manual(
    values = treatment_colors,
    name = "Treatment"
  ) +
  scale_shape_discrete(
    name = "Paclitaxel"
  ) +
  facet_grid(
    rows = vars(component_2),
    cols = vars(component_1)
  ) +
  theme_bw()

ps <- pca_x_vs %>%
  group_nest(
    component_1,
    component_2
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    across(
      starts_with("component"),
      \(x) fct_relabel(x, \(y) paste0(y, " (", as.character(pca_eigen_map[y]), "%)"))
    )
  ) %>%
  rowwise() %>%
  mutate(
    p = list(
      ggplot(
        data,
        aes(
          x = value_1,
          y = value_2,
          shape = paclitaxel,
          color = treatment
        )
      ) +
        geom_point() +
        scale_color_manual(
          values = treatment_colors,
          name = "Rescue treatment"
        ) +
        scale_shape_discrete(
          name = "Paclitaxel"
        ) +
        labs(
          x = component_1,
          y = component_2
        )
    )
  )

ps_combined <- egg::ggarrange(
  plots = ps$p
)

ggsave(
  file.path("plots", "pca_ruvk4_combined_1-4.pdf"),
  ps_combined,
  width = 10,
  height = 8
)
```
